item.title: Here’s where the jobs are for November 2024 — in one chart
item.description: Health care and social assistance led the way yet again last month, seeing 72,300 new positions added in that area, per the Bureau of Labor Statistics...

item.title: SpaceX faces opposition to Starlink expansion from Ukrainian group concerned about Musk ties to Russia
item.description: A Ukrainian-American group filed a petition with the FCC to try and keep Starlink from putting almost 22,500 satellites into orbit until further revie...

item.title: Appeals court upholds law ordering China-based ByteDance to sell TikTok or face U.S. ban
item.description: Members of Congress had raised national security concerns about TikTok due to its ownership by ByteDance, which is based in China.

item.title: Uber will offer robotaxi rides in Abu Dhabi through partnership with WeRide
item.description: Uber said robotaxi rides will be available between Saadiyat Island and Yas Island, as well as routes to and from Zayed International Airport.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades Hewlett Packard Enterprise, sees stock surging nearly 30%
item.description: Morgan Stanley is optimistic on HPE's upcoming acquisition of Juniper Networks.
